q1: What image formats can I convert?
a1: You can upload images in JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, SVG, HEIC (iPhone photos), AVIF, TIFF, and ICO formats. The tool auto-detects the format from the file's actual data, not just the extension.
a2: You can convert to JPG (best for photos, smallest size), PNG (lossless, supports transparency), or WebP (modern format, great compression with transparency). All conversions happen in your browser.
q3: Can I convert HEIC photos from my iPhone?
a3: Yes! Simply upload your .heic files and convert them to JPG, PNG, or WebP. The conversion happens entirely in your browser â€” your photos are never uploaded to any server.
